alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Marshall; Story (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 12:59PM CST until December 28 at 2:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Light Wintry Mix from Central Into Northern and Eastern Iowa Today... Freezing rain and a wintry mix will continue into mid day in central Iowa, with both a wintry mix and snow in eastern Iowa through the afternoon. Roads will be slick at times. In central Iowa conditions are expected to improve as temperatures rise above freezing this afternoon, but in northeastern Iowa the wintry mix may persist until this evening due to cooler temperatures. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet, mixing in with wet snow. Additional snow accumulations less than an inch. * WHERE...Parts of central and east-central Iowa, including parts of the Des Moines metro area. * WHEN...Until 2 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibilities at times. Use extra caution out on the roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and be careful while driving or walking.
